author: johan
msg: Adds support for columns that act as incr/decr counters. Patch primarily by Kelvin Kakugawa with select parts from Chris Goffinet, Sylvain Lebresne, Rob Coli, Johan Oskarsson, Adam Samet, Jaakko Laine and more. Review by Jonathan Ellis and Sylvain Lebresne. CASSANDRA-1072.

author: gdusbabek
msg: apply CF metadata updates only at apply time. patch by gdusbabek, reviewed by jbellis. CASSANDRA-1853

author: tabish
msg: Update the failover transport to filter out stale message acks correctly.

author: gpetracek
msg: small changes for EXTCDI-89 and EXTCDI-100
